What is the Gold Card Program

div.div:
Souderton Area School District is committed to providing all students with a high-quality education in a healthy and safe environment. During our school closure due to coronavirus, following guidance from PDE (the Pennsylvania Department of Education),we focused on reinforcing skills and content through learning menus made available on our At Home Learning Web site and in Schoology.
With an extended closure, a transition to home learning through Schoology took place during the week of March 30th. In Schoology, the Districts Learning Management System,teachers provide students with resources to engage them in core academic content learning, in addition to promoting core competencies that contribute to their long-term success: resilience, innovative thinking, personal wellness, and social consciousness.
For information regarding teaching and learning for the remainder of the school year, please see theContinuity of Education Plan, March-June 2019-2020.
Schoology STATUS
*If you are experiencing difficulty,
check Schoology's status to see if they are having a service interruption.
Use the links below for At Home Learning resources by level:
At Home Learning - Elementary
At Home Learning - Middle School
At Home Learning - High School
760 Lower Road, Souderton, PA 18964 | Phone 215.723.6061 | Fax 215.723.8897
